definitions.title: vb. remain over, be in excess
definitions.body: , syn. of [[סרח]] q.v., only PH (NH id., Aram. [[עָדִיף]] superior (to); Ar. gadafa be profuse, IV. let down veil, or curtain, etc.; gadafun plentifulness);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. [[סֶרַח הָעׂדֵף]] Ex 26:12 the surplus (of curtains) that remains over, so f. [[הָעׂדֶ֫פֶת]] v:Ex 26:12, and [[הָעׂדֵף]] as subst. v:Ex 26:13 the excess in ([[ב]]) length; [[הָעׂדֵף]] = the surplus of food Ex 16:23, of price of field Le 25:27; [[הָעׂדְפִים עַל־]] those over and above, Nu 3:46, Nu 3:49, cf. v:Nu 3:48 (no [[עַל־]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הֶעְדִּיף]] Ex 16:18 have a surplus (of manna; opp. [[הֶחְסִיר]]).
